name: TC532 - To verify that name of the originator of the conversation is displayed in the search results.
TC591 - To verify "Forwarded" mail becomes part of the original thread for the user who is forwarding the mail.
TC528 - To verify the search results are displayed under "All Mailboxes" apart from chosen SM.
TC596 - To verify "From" address is being picked up from gmail settings by default if user is forwarding a mail.
TC524 - To verify that the separate search page contains switchable "SM" and All mailboxes" tab.
TC540 - To verify "No internet" hello bar is being displayed in search screen if there is not internet.
TC720 - To verify Non-SM user is able to access the public permalink shared.
TC719 - To verify "Public Permalink" shared is accessible to user part of same SM.
TC694 - To verify the link, refresh and delete icon is visible/present once after the public permalink generated
TC705 - To verify user is able to send a "Private Permalink" as reply/forward from compose section of conversation.
TC707 - To verify user is able to access "Private Permalink" for SM which he is part of.
TC525 - To verify whether "Cancel"  button in the search page takes user back to home page of the app or not.
TC559 - To verify "Show Quoted Text" is visible in the conversation thread list page.
TC567 - To verify click on the "Reply" or "Reply all" quoted text will automatically be attached
TC587 - To verify users are able to "Forward" the entire conversation present in the thread.
TC715 - To verify "Public Permalink Generate" option is disabled If an SM or UG configuration does not allow users to create public permalink.
TC558 - Search with other languages
TC539 - To verify email address of the person is displayed when the name of the originator for the conversation is not present.
TC577 - To verify the quoted text with no internet
TC564 - To verify "Hide Quoted Text" and "Remove" link is visible when user has expanded the quoted text in compose screen.
TC698 - To verify user should be able to delete an existing public permalink
TC584 - To check the quoted text should not be the part of Shared Draft
TC758 - To verify if user clicks on the "Public Permalink", he/she taken to the webpage even if the app is installed.
TC544 - To verify user is able to scroll the search result.
TC561 - To verify "Hide Quoted Text" is clickable and the entire conversation thread under quoted text should collapse if user clicks the same
TC545 - To verify if search item updates when assignee/status/read-unread is updated from mobile or web
TC593 - To verify if mail is forwarded to wrong/invalid recipients, proper error message is thrown.
TC531 - To verify that the search results are displayed according to the recent email activity done for conversations.
TC563 - To verify "Show Quoted Text" is visible in "Compose" screen as well and is clickable.
TC541 - To verify empty screen along with proper error message is being displayed when user searches using invalid keywords.
TC572 - To verify the quoted text with new recipient
TC713 - To verify proper error message is thrown if user edits the private permalink and tries accessing the same.
TC543 - To verify search results are displayed even when user puts the app in background and comes back again.
TC576 - To verify the removed quoted text in the Gmail conversation
TC583 - To verify the date format and email address in the quoted text
TC522 - To verify "Search" icon is visible in the homepage of the app.
TC565 - To verify user is able to collapse the quoted text by clicking on "Hide Quoted Text" link in compose screen.
TC560 - To verify "Show quoted text" is clickable in conversation thread list page.
TC588 - To verify "Forwarded" mail becomes part of the original thread for the user who is forwarding the mail.
TC709 - To verify user is able to access "Private Permalink" from Activities/Notes if user is part of same SM
TC693 - To verify if user is able to copy "Private Permalink" or not.
TC718 - To verify user is able to send out the "Public Permalink" as "Reply/Reply All/Forward/Notes"
TC594 - To verify "From" address is being picked up from gmail settings by default if user is forwarding a mail.
TC550 - To verify search with some special characters
TC590 - To verify that the cursor lands on "To" field in "Compose Page" when user is forwarding/forwards a mail
TC533 - To verify "Subject of the conversation, Snippet of the latest email on the conversation and Count of number of emails in the conversation" are being displayed in the searched results or not.
TC581 - To verify the quoted received by the new recipient
TC706 - To verify "Private Permalink" is easily distinguishable between normal text and public permalink created both in dark and lite mode.
TC696 - To verify the first name of the SM member who is created the public permalink is displayed below the popup modal
TC756 - To verify the if the app will show a restricted page stating that the user does not have access to the conversation.
TC535 - To verify search result contains chips representing the first name of the "Assignee"  and "Status" of the conversation.
TC689 - To verify user should be able to refresh an existing public permalink
TC527 - To verify search results are based on "Start with" search across "BODY" and "SUBJECT" of the email.
TC690 - To verify "Permalink icon" is not visible/present for only Gmail Inbox conversations.
TC697 - To verify the first name of the SM member who is created the public permalink is displayed below the popup modal
TC523 - To verify user is taken to separate "Search" page when he clicks on the "Search" icon.
TC582 - To check the quoted text is removed in both sender and receiver side
TC566 - To verify quoted text gets removed/deleted from the compose screen if user clicks on "Remove" link in compose screen
TC714 - To verify user is able to access the "Private Permalink" sent over other apps if he s part of same SM for which permalink is generated.
TC716 - To verify user is able to create a  Public Permalink  if "SM or UG configuration allow users to create public permalink.
TC537 - To verify SM chip name is displayed under "All mailbox" tab in search result page.
TC574 - To verify the quoted text should be collapsed by default
TC695 - To verify creates and updates of a public permalink should be reflected in the activity panel
TC589 - To verify "Forwarded" mail becomes part of the original thread for the user who is forwarding the mail.
TC526 - To verify if user clicks on the "Close" icon in search field, the keyboard should not dismiss.
TC712 - To verify user is able to access "Private Permalink" from "Quoted Text" if user is still part of same SM.
TC598 - To verify the focus/cusor when user removes the attachment in compose screen
TC571 - To verify the quoted in the Shared Draft screen
TC579 - To verify quoted text with dark mode
TC721 - To verify the creation of a public permalink is reflected in the activity panel.
TC692 - To verify Permalink Icon is accessible for conversation belonging to SM/Inbox+SM
TC573 - To verify the removed quoted text in the Gmail conversation
TC530 - To verify that the search results are displayed according to the recent email activity done for conversations.
TC700 - To verify the deletion of a public permalink should be reflected in the activity panel
TC538 - To verify the very first SM name chip is displayed in the "All mailboxes" search result under conversation if conversation is part of multiple SM's
TC585 - To verify the cursor when attachments added to the compose screen
TC557 - Search with unicodes
TC691 - To verify "Permalink icon" is visible/present for conversation belonging to SM/ Inbox + SM
TC586 -To verify user is able to see "Forward" button at the bottom in the conversation list page.
TC445 - To verify user is able to change the status of the mail added to SM from any of the views present.
TC28- Verify that the app remembers the last accessed section between Notes/Activities in conversation footer
TC32- Verify that user can swipe left from All Activities and come to conversation screen
TC366 - To verify "Search" tab opens on click of "Assign to" text in Conversation page.
TC37- Verify that user is able to add a new note or reply to existing note
TC56- Verify that user is able to @mention people on note
TC289- Verify that user is taken to activity screen on opening a notification related to activity
TC377 - To verify search results are displayed when user enters valid username in the "Assign to" search field.
TC374 - To verify that dropdown list is closed if user clicks outside the list of "Assign to" usernames.
TC442 - To verify the default status of the new mail added to SM is "Open".
TC435 - To verify user is able to see all the other "Views" option present when he clicks on the view floater button
TC38- Verify that user is able to select between All Activities/Notes
TC30- Verify that the count of all activities/notes is shown on the conversation footer and in Activities Panel
TC75- Verify that user can mark the notification as unread/read in notification centre
TC52- Edited Note: Verify that whenever a note is edited, user can see the relevant message
TC72- Verify that user can add any notes with special character
TC51- Delete Note: Verify that whenever a note gets deleted, relevant message is shown to the user
TC367 - To verify "Unassign" tag is not being displayed when mail/mails are not assigned.
TC285- Verify that count of activity gets updated on changing status of an email
TC27- Verify that user can see the Activity timeline pertaining to a conversation
TC369 - To verify if user clicks on "Unassign" , the conversation should get unassigned from the current user.
TC283- Verify that user is able to swipe to conversation screen from activity screen
TC378 - To verify search result are displayed if the list contains valid characters given as inputs in search field.
TC71- Verify that content of notification is changed when the note is edited
TC60- Verify that user is able to delete only their notes
TC443 - To verify user is able to expand the "Status" module by clicking on the same in conversation thread list page.
TC381 - To verify user is able to search and fetch results using "Last Name" of the username.
TC74- Verify that notification is sent to the user if anyone replies to the note of that user
TC436 - To verify user is able to switch between the views of the particular SM.
TC63- Verify that notification of @mention note is update if the note is deleted
TC368 - To verify on tapping "ME(Current user name)", the conversation should be assigned to current user.
TC61- Verify that placeholder text is shown after deleting notes
TC39- Verify that user is able to see the count of notes on the footer of the conversation as well as on Activity Panel.
TC441 - To verify user is able to search and fetch results using "Last Name" of the username.
TC376 - To verify name of the user to whom mail is conversation is assigned is displayed in the conversation page.
TC438 - To verify if user switches between the SM, the views list and count should be according the SM chosen
TC65- Verify that user is able to edit their own notes
TC40- Verify that user is able to see all the conversations including the users own conversations in Activity Panel
TC284- Verify that count of activity gets updated on sending a note from activity screen and then on swiping right
TC55- Verify that user is able to add a new note or reply to an existing note
TC372 - To verify keyboard is popped up when user clicks on the "Search starts with" text field in "Assign to" drop down/popup
TC44- Verify that user should see only 2 lines of parent notes and the commentors name for context
TC33- Verify that user can swipe right from conversation screen to All Activities/Notes screen
TC371 - To verify proper toast message is being displayed when conversation is being Unassigned from a particular user.
TC380 - To verify user is able to search and fetch results using "First Name" of the username.
TC70- Verify that if any "new" user is mentioned as a part of an edit, the user must be notified
TC447 - To verify the "Status" modal is still in expanded state if user closes the app or puts the app in background and opens the app again..
TC287- Verify that if the user has switched to Notes in Activity Screen, Conversation footer should contain Notes count
TC45- Verify that if a note is longer than a particular height  it should be truncated with a cue ‘See more’ which can be tapped on to view the entire note
TC29- Verify if the user has switched from Notes to Activity or vice versa on Activities Panel, panel should maintain the same state when the user visits the same screen next time.
TC434 - To verify Unassigned "View" floater button is present along with the views count when user logs in the app every time by default
TC57- Verify that note goes to pending if the internet goes off
TC379 - To verify proper error message is displayed when user tries to search with invalid input.
TC444 - To verify the "Status" drop up modal in expanded state is closed if user clicks outside the expanded state anywhere on the screen
TC31- Verify that the app remembers the last accessed section between Notes/Activities in conversation footer.
TC43- Verify that if a note is a response to an existing note, user should be able to see only one level of threading
